verses.content: Chun, LALPA chun Mosie kuom- ah, “Pharao kuomah fe la, ‘LALPA, Hebraihai Pathien chun hieng hin a tih: ka rawng an bâwl theina dingin ka mihai infetir rawh.
Anni chu infetir i phal nawha, i khuokhir zing chun,
ngai rawh, loa i ran ruol umhai, sakawrhai, sabengtunghai, sa- nghâwngseihai, bâwng ruolhai le, berâm ruolhai chungah LALPA kut chu hri râpthlâktak leh tlâng a tih.
Chun, LALPA chun, Aigupta mihai le Israelhai ran ruolhai thlier a ta, Israel thlahai ta taphawt chu iengkhawm thi naw tawp an tih, a tih,’ tiin hril rawh,” a tih a.
LALPA chun hun bîk a ruot a, “Hi thil hi, hi rama hin zîngah LALPAIN thawng a tih,” a tih a.
A zînga chun chu thil chu LALPA chun a thaw tah a. Aigupta mihai ran ruol po po chu an thi vawng a, Israel thlahai ran ruol ruok chu pakhat khawm an thi nawh a.
Pharao chun mi a tir a, Israel thlahai ran ruol chu pakhat khawm an thi dêr nawh ti a hriet a. Nisienlakhawm, Pharao lungril chu a ngar a, mihai chu ân fetir chuong nawh.
LALPA chun Mosie le Aron kuoma chun, “Thuka vut kut sipin chawi unla, Pharao mithmu ngeiah Mosiein vân tieng vawr raw se.
Chun, Aigupta ram chung po poah pilvut indi takah inchang a ta, Aigupta ram sûng po povah mihriem le ran chungah khuoihli invûngin inchang a tih,” a tih a.
Chun, thuka vut chu an lâk a, Pharao hmaa chun an ngir a; Mosie chun vân tieng chun a vawr tah a, chuongchun, mihriem le ran chunga chun khuoihli invûngah ân chang tah a.
Chun, khuoihlihai lei chun aisânthiemhai chu Mosie hmaa chun an ngîr thei ta nawh a; chu khuoihli chu Aigupta mihai po po le aisân- thiemhai chunga khawm a um seng sih a.
Chun, LALPAIN Pharao lungril chu a sukngar a, LALPAIN Mosie kuoma a hril ta angin an thu hril chu a ngai chuong nawh a.
LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Zîngkâr inhmatakin tho la, Pharao hmaah ngîr la, a kuomah, ‘Hebraihai Pathien LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: ka rawng an bâwl theina dingin ka mihai infetir rawh.
Hnuoi chung po poah keima ang tukhawm an um nawh ti i hriet theina dingin, tuta ṭum hin chu, i mihai le i siehlawhai le nangma chunga ngei ka hri po po ka hung tir ding a ni sih a.
Tuhin ka kut inlet ka ta, i mihai le nang ngei chu hripuiin hrem ka ti cheu a, hnuoia inthawka sâtthlâk ni tâng i tih:
nisienlakhawm, hi thilthaw kawng ngeihaia hin ka thilthawthei- nahai chu nangmaa inentir a ni theina ding le khawvêl po poa ka hming chu phuongdar a ni theina dingin ka la dawmngir zing che a ni hi.
Ka mihai chunga hin nang le nang inchawimawiin, anni chu i lân fetir naw rawp ding a ni maw?
Ngai rawh, zîngah tu pha ngei hin riel nasa râpthlâk insûrtir ka ta; chuong ang hrim hrim chu Aigup- taah, hi ram um hlima inthawk tu chen hin a la um ngai dêr nawh.

Chuleiin, tuhin mi tir la, i ran ruol le loa i thil nei po po chu inhulah hung la lût vak raw hai se; mi tin le ran loa um taphawthai, ina hung lâk lût nawhai chungah riel chu a hung sûr ding a ni sih a, an thi vawng ding a nih, a tih,’ tiin hril rawh,” a tih a.
Pharao siehlawhai laia LALPA thu ṭitu chun a siehlawhai le a ran ruol chu inahai ân tlân lûttir a;
LALPA thu ngaisaknawtu ruok chun a siehlawhai le ran ruol chu loah ân umtir a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie kuom- ah, “Aigupta ram sûng po poa, mihriem le ran le loa thlai tinrêng chungah, Aigupta ram po poah riel nasatak a hung sûr theina dingin, vân tieng i kut phar rawh,” a tih a.

Chun, Mosie chun a hmawl chu vân tieng ân let a; chuongchun, LALPA chun vâninrûm le riel chu a hung tir tah a, hnuoia chun mei dâm a zuk tlah a, LALPA chun Aigupta ram chunga chun riel ân sûrtir tah a.
Chuongchun, riel, ṭêktla le riel inpawl, râpthlâktak el, Aigupta ram po poah, hnam a hung ni chena inthawka la hmu ngai dêr lo chu a hung tlung tah a.
Aigupta ram po poa, loa thil um taphawt chu mihriem le ran khawm a dêng hlum ta vawng a; riel chun loa thlaihna tinrêng chu a dêng hlumin, rama thinghai khawm chu a dêng thliek bawk a.
Israel thlahai umna Gosen rama bak chun riel chu a tla ve nawh a.
Chun, Pharao chun mi a tir a, Aron le Mosie chu ân kotir a, an kuomah, “Tuta ṭum chu ka lo suol takzet a nih, ka mihai le kei chu kan khawhlo a, LALPA ruok chu a fel a nih.
Hun ta raw se, riel le vâninrûm ri nasatakhai hi a bona dingin LALPA chu hni la, chuongchun, infetir ka ti cheu, um ta hrim hrim naw ti niu,” a tih a.

Mosie chun a kuomah, “Khaw- pui hi ka suoksan phingleh, LALPA tieng ka kut phar ka ta, hnuoi hi LALPA ta a nih ti i hriet theina dingin, vâninrûmhai chu mâng a ta; riel hrim khawm um nâwk ta dêr naw nih.
Nisienlakhawm, nang le i sie- hlawhai chun, LALPA Pathien chu la ṭi chuong naw ti niu ti ka hriet a nih,” a tih a.
Ziza le buṭei chu dêng hlumin an um a, buṭei chu a vui tahin ziza khawm chu a pâr lai tak a ni sih a.
Bupui le mîm ruok chu dêng siet an ni ve nawh a, an puitling inhnu leiin.
Mosie chu Pharao kuoma inthawka khawpui puoha a suok chun, LALPA kuom tieng a kut chu a phar tah a; chun, vâninrûmhai le riel chu a ma tah a, hnuoi chunga chun ruo khawm a sûr ta nawh a.
Pharao chun ruo le riel le vâninrûmhai chu a ma tah ti a hmu chun, a la suksuol ta rawp a, ama le a siehlawhai khawm chun an lungril chu an la sukngar ta rawp a.
Pharao lungril chu sukngarin a um a, Mosie baua LALPAIN a lo hril ta angin, ama chun Israel thlahai chu ân fetir nuom nawh a.
